resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete all your conversations?
hike couldn\'t delete your account. Please try again.
Good News! Your friend is already on hike!
You\'ve blocked %1$s. Unblock and continue hiking.
You can now receive all your SMSs in hike. Tap below to turn this feature on.
Could not upload file. Check network settings.
Waiting for %1$s to reply to join in
Could not download file. Check network settings.
Could not download file. Please redownload file.
File Inaccessible. Please mount SD Card and try again.
Your phone does not have enough space to download the file
%1$s is on DND. Waiting for %1$s to reply.
Are you sure you want to unlink your facebook account from Hike?
Are you sure you want to unlink your twitter account from Hike?
SMS can only be sent to India
Unable to call you. Please try again.
Max file size can be 100 MB
For better accuracy to your location, enable the GPS.
Turn on to send free SMS to India
Select the contacts you want to invite
That\'s an invalid phone number. Try again.
Entered a wrong number? Tap here
Looks like something went wrong.\nPlease enter your phone # again.
Double tap anywhere on the\nchat to nudge your friend.
Flash the LED on new message
Are you sure you want to leave this group?
Are you sure you want to delete this Broadcast List?

Are you sure you want to remove %1$s from this list?
Cannot fetch your location. Please check your settings.
Tap here to invite this person
Could not delete your status update. Please check your network connection and try again later.
Tap here to block this number
Send your friends a free SMS invite.
Could not update status. Please check your network connection and try again later.
Would you like to import your existing messages into hike?
Give us a moment while we import your messages into hike.
Tap here to attach a wonderful mood :)
You will now send regular SMS through hike. Operator rates will apply.
To send a regular SMS, you need to make hike your primary SMS inbox
You can now send and receive regular SMS with hike. To do so, you\'ll need to make hike your primary SMS inbox.
Please enable your phone browser to to view System Health
Hike requires an email application installed on your device to proceed
Would you like to do the same?
Only your friends can see when you were last seen
Earn additional free SMS for every friend that joins hike through your SMS invite.
Free SMS can only be sent to India.
You\'ve run out of free SMS. Invite %1$s to get some more!
Looks like %1$s is not on hike yet! Invite %1$s to hike. Standard operator SMS rates apply.
Now invite friends via SMS for free. No charges apply :)
The chat theme will change for you and your friend
The chat theme will change for the group
Unable to set profile picture, please free some space on your SD Card and retry
Double tap on the conversation to send a heart!
Looks like there’s no internet\nconnection! Try fixing it and\nproceed.
"You have got %1$s contacts \n on hike. Nice!"
The more you use hike, the more you earn!
Tap and hold to select multiple files
Are you sure you want to delete this message?
Are you sure you want to delete these %1$s messages?
Are you sure you want to clear all messages in this conversation?

Didn\'t get the PIN, we will call you

Tap here to dismiss favorite suggestions
Your patterns don’t match. Try again.

resources.string: Forgot your password? Reset Hidden Mode. All hidden chats will be deleted.
Hidden Mode will be reset in 30 minutes. All hidden chats will be deleted! Continue?
All hidden chats will be deleted in %1$s minutes
Tap here to reset Hidden Mode now!
Resetting Hidden Mode will delete all your hidden Chats.\nAre you sure?
Tap and hold on a chat to mark a chat \'Hidden\'.
Play sound for incoming and outgoing messages
hike couldn\'t logout your account. Please try again
Clear your messages and profile from this device.
Are you sure you want to reset your account?
Note: Only hike contacts with %1$s in their address book will receive this broadcast.
status is visible to favorites only
easier to use and faster than ever
tap to check out the stickers.
Hey, %1$d people you know are on hike. Start chatting!
Hike is full of awesome things that we would like to show you.
Mark your private chats as hidden and access them with passcode.
Stickers you use often will be shown here
Emoticons you use often will be shown here
Hey, join me on hike messenger!\n It\'s the only messaging app that is made in India! Get it now - http://hike.in/ and Hike up your life
Hey! Check out hike messenger. Now send Docs, PPTs, MP3s and more; up to 100MB each! Get it now - http://hike.in/ and Hike up your life
Hey, check out hike messenger. It has amazing stickers & stunning chat themes! Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. It let\'s you show your \'Last Seen\' only to select friends! Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. You can now hide your private chats from others. Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Hey, check out hike messenger. You can chat with even those friends who are offline. Download - http://hike.in and Hike up your life!
Tap here to post a status update. Only your favorites can see them.
Only favorites can see your last seen & status updates
Send messages to friends even when they are offline
When words can’t express, say it with a sticker
Amazing things you can do on hike

This will delete all your messages, backup, free SMS and any hike rewards

Receiver does not have enough memory
Receiver does not have SD Card

Hike Direct is the new way to stay connected to your friends even when you’re out of data. It allows you to send messages and share files with your nearby friends absolutely free. There is no file size limit and you can send movies, videos, music, apps and whatever you want absolutely free of cost.
Condition 1:Your friend is within 100 meters of you.Of course the closer you are , the better the connection!
Condition 2:To start a connection , also ask your friend to tap on Hike Direct option from your chat.
Does Hike Direct work for group chats as well ?
As of now, Hike Direct only works for 1:1 chats. It doesn’t work for group chats. Stay tuned in for updates on this space.
Something went wrong.Please try again in a while
Hike Stickey offers multiple features like sharing stickers on messaging apps etc. Please enable and turn it ON.
Hike needs Accessibility Services to be enabled for this feature. Please tap here and select Hike
Hike needs Accessibility Service to be enabled for this feature. Tap ENABLE and select Hike

I just downloaded the new hike messenger. What a big change from WhatsApp!

It's got amazing stickers, the ability to hide my chats and some really cool chat themes. 

Download it now from http://get.hike.in/$invite_token

Hey, join me on hike, the only messaging app made in India! It lets you hide your chats, send messages to friends when they\'re offline and send awesome stickers. \n\nAlso share all types of files - docs, songs, movies etc, up to 100MB each - Download: http://get.hike.in/
Hey, check out hike messenger. It has awesome stickers in our language! Join the only made in India messaging app- Download at http://hike.in/$invite_token
